Class MirrorArrayAdapter<V>

  • java.lang.Object

          • com.futurice.cascade.reactive.ui.MirrorArrayAdapter<V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class MirrorArrayAdapter<V>
extends AltArrayAdapter<V>
    Created by Paul Houghton on 20-Oct-14.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MirrorArrayAdapter.MirrorDelegate
      This can be attached to an upstream MirrorService to copy changes in the data model onto the screen.
